column2: "Na Tiberius Kaesar dzi adze
column4: na Pontius Pilate dzi Judea ambrado
column6: na no nua Filip dzi ɔmansinhen wɔ Iturea nye Trakonitis asaase do
column9: "na Annas nye Kaiafas dzi asɔfompanyin no
column10: Nyankopɔn asɛm baa Zekaria ne ba John hɔ wɔ sar no do."

column2: "Na ɔbaa asaase a abɔ Jordan ho aprɔw nyina
column3: na ɔpaa mu kaa nnuho enuma a ɔdze kɔ bɔnfakyɛ mu no ho asɛm
column5: "dɛ mbrɛ wɔakyerɛw no wɔ nkɔnhyɛnyi Isaia ne nsɛm nwoma mu dɛ
column6: Obi ne ndze retsea mu wɔ sar no do dɛ

column2: "Wɔbɛhyɛ mbɔnsa nyina amaama
column3: Mbepɔw nye nkokwaa nyina wɔbɛbrɛ no adze; dza akyeakyea nyina bɛtsentsen
column4: Na akwan a ɔyɛ kekakeka ayɛ trontrom."

column2: "Na nyimpa nyina bohu Nyankopɔn no nkwagye."
"Na obisaa nyimpadodow a woepue aba dɛ onnuma hɔn no dɛ
column3: Nhurutsia mba! Woana tuu hom fo dɛ hom nguan mfi ebufuw a ɔreba no ho?"

column2: "Na afei hom nsow aba a ɔfata nnuho na mma hom nnhyɛ ase nnka wɔ hom mu dɛ
column4: hɛn egya nye Abraham: na mese hom dɛ Nyankopɔn botum dɛ onyan mba fi abo yi mu ma Abraham."

column2: "Na afei so dze
column3: wɔdze abɔndua no ato ndua no ndwow ho dada
column4: dɛ dua biara a ɔnnsow aba pa no wobotwa no ato gya mu."

column2: "Na nyimpadodow no bisaa no dɛ
"Na obuae see hɔn dɛ
column4: wɔmma ɔmma nyimpa a onnyi bi no bi; na nyia ɔwɔ edziban so

column2: "Na atowgyefo bi baa dɛ onnuma hɔn
"Na ɔsee hɔn dɛ
column3: Mma hom nngye mma ɔnnkyɛn dza wɔahyɛ ato hɔ."

column2: "Na asogyafo bi so bisaa no dɛ
column3: Hɛn so yɛnyɛ dɛn? Na ɔsee hɔn dɛ
column5: eso mma hom nntoatoa obiara gyan
column6: na hom mma hom akatua nsɔ hom enyi."

column2: "Na ɔman no hɔn enyiwa daa kwan
column3: na hɔn nyina susui wɔ hɔn akoma mu wɔ John ho dɛ gyama ɔno nye Kraest no
column7: munuma hom nsu mu; na nyia no ho yɛ dzen kyɛn me no reba a no nsokota ho ahoma mpo
column8: mennsɛ dɛ mesan: ɔno na obonuma hom wɔ Sunsum Krɔnkrɔn mu

column2: "ɔno na no nhuwdo apaawa kitsa ne nsamu
column3: dɛ ɔrebɛpra ne famu hɔ kofee
column4: na ɔaboaboa n’ewifua ano ekogu san do
column5: na ntsɛw no ɔdze gya a onndum ahyew."

column2: "Na ndzɛmba pii ka ho wɔ n’afotu mu a ɔdze kaa nsɛmpa kyerɛɛ nkorɔfo no."
"Naaso ɔmansinhen Herod a nna ɔnam no nua ne yer Herodias
column3: nye emumuyɛ bi so a ɔno Herod ayɛ ma John etwuw n’enyim ntsi no

column2: "dze ne nyina kaa ho na ɔdze John too efiadze."
"Na aber a ogu do runuma nkorɔfo nyina no
column3: Jesus so bae ma wonumaa no
column7: "na Sunsum Krɔnkrɔn sianee wɔ honam subea mu
column8: tse dɛ ebubur baa no do
column9: na ndze bi fi sor bae dɛ
column10: Ɔwo nye mo Dɔba a esɔ m’enyi."

column2: "Jesus hyɛɛ n’edwuma ase no nna oedzi bɛyɛ mfe eduasa; na
column4: ) ɔyɛ Josef a Heli woo no no ne ba

column2: "Mattat a n’egyanom santsen nye; Levi
column87: na Adam a ɔyɛ Nyankopɔn ne ba no."
